mapper.sql: id, kit_name, product_num, vender, kit_type, equipment, total_assets, rights_unit, kit_properties, kit_standard, brachium, depreciation_rate, unit_type, measurement_unit, standard_section_height, kit_model, kit_code, amount, single_price, whole_machine_accessories, protector_id, insert_person, insert_person_depart_id, update_person, update_person_depart_id, insert_date, update_date,purchase_date, retire_date
mapper.select:
select
from wm_kit_entry
and product_num like concat('%', #{productNum}, '%')
and vender like concat('%', #{vender}, '%')
and kit_type like concat('%', #{kitType}, '%')
and equipment like concat('%', #{equipment}, '%')
and kit_model like concat('%', #{kitModel}, '%')
and kit_code like concat('%', #{kitCode}, '%')
and date_format(purchase_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{purchaseDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(retire_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{retireDate},'%y%m%d')
